title: Dodging In Ranked
body:
Recently I was in my promotions to gold 3, I was first pick and I called top.
the second pick instalocked fiora top lane, I went jg to try to avoid a huge fight but it was not to be, from that point everyone in the lobby became as toxic as can possible be trying to make the game as horrible for the others in the lobby as they could.
I dodged this game as there was no chance of winning and I didn't want to experience 20 minutes of play with these individuals.
As the result of myself dodging an incredibly negative experience that would also effect the enemy team, I was penalised with a time penalty and a loss in my promotion series, I viewed this as incredibly unfair not just to me but to all the people that dodge games like that for legitimate reasons.
That's why I'm asking riot to invest in a system that maybe allows players to dodge without repercussions if certain criteria are met. I hate the fact that people who try to do the right thing are penalised and those who caused the problem are free to queue up again right away. Thanks for reading and any suggestions for how this system would be cool to know.
Up vote to get Riot to look into this

replies.body: its still almost as bad even with the new champ select. i got mid when i went in game and this guys said he was first pick and he wanted mid but got jg and i was forced under my feet to "obey" him. and this doesnt prevent trolls from well.... trolling. i was forced to dodge a queue simply because someone wanted to go AP mid wukong and i wasnt about to risk it. was my frist dodge in ranked and i got 10LP taken off and 30 min. i think they got the timers wrong but honestly cant be stuffed
The new champ select is fixing most of these problems. You choose 2 roles before you get into champ select. don't worry it will all be gone soon :D

There's a new champion select for this.Dw,it will be over ASAP(maybe)as long as new champ select launch
And I rarely ever see toxic ranked in oce.Is it that bad?
